TopicTitle: Sector 7 Space Laboratories VTOL Division - Rabid One

Articles.Content:
Rabid One

Speeds around 130 m/s, hovers like a dream, make a 180 degree at 130 m/s and regain control easily, make a back flip at high speeds and continue in flight like you never made a maneuver.

Flight Operations:

It is recommended to fuel the Wings of the Craft before flight for extended flights. At the runway apply the brakes, engage RCS and SAS, throttle up to full then press spacebar for the Lift Engines to engage and a second time for the Rear Engines to engage.

Flight Controls

1-Lift Engines

2-Rear Engines

3-Vertical Landing Lights

4-Runway Lights

That's awesome looking dude! And I can hardly believe I'm going to say this, but she has a lovely bottom.

Kudos for including a refuel cart for those back to back missions!

Awesome! Can't rep you right now, fr*&k!

Reminds me of playing Elite 2: Frontier, back in the nineties. Not just the agility, also the shape!
